name: R3X Virtual Machine
body: ![Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Benderx2/R3X/gh-pages/rxvmlogo.png) R3X Virtual Machine === R3X is an experiment to rebuild an entire runtime environment from scratch. The project began in the November of 2014, as a hobbyist's attempt at studying virtual machines. Since then, the project has moved quite ahead, and is very functional. There is indeed quite a lot of complications and technical errors, but it is improving. The runtime environment features a debugger, a fully capable instruction set, a standard library, a compiler and a small terminal emulator which uses OpenGL capabilities.
